about_the_game: Corrupt Eldritch Order is a 2D-Action Platformer, where you play as an assassin hired by your employer. Your job isn't exactly easy, and you have to deal with monsters of the like you've never seen before. You can play as four classes in the game, new recruit, agent, technician, and "The Closer". Rely on the help of the merchant, a character you'll meet on numerous occasions as you trek through each level where he'll give you the tools and resources that can best your enemies.
detailed_description: Corrupt Eldritch Order is a 2D-Action Platformer, where you play as an assassin hired by your employer. Your job isn't exactly easy, and you have to deal with monsters of the like you've never seen before. You can play as four classes in the game, new recruit, agent, technician, and "The Closer". Rely on the help of the merchant, a character you'll meet on numerous occasions as you trek through each level where he'll give you the tools and resources that can best your enemies.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13
  • Processor: Dual Core i5 / Apple M1
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

name: Corrupt Eldritch Order

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 1 GHZ
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Play as an assassin hired to complete a job in a dark city filled with corrupted beasts. A 2D Action-platformer where each level will test your will, ingenuity, and resourcefulness as you wade through beasts on your journey to complete your job.
